links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = (1/2)*(15 + 5*(-1)^n) - 5*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 09 2009
mathematica: ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[27],300] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 05 2011 *)PadRight[{5},120,{10,5}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 19 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 35000); x=contfrac(sqrt(27)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040021.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010482 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 04 2009
